name: Ervia
goal: Ervia is a commercial semi-state company with responsibility for the delivery of gas and water infrastructure and services in Ireland.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
• Energy Union • 2030 Energy and Climate Change Policy • Internal Energy Market legislation
• Infrastructure and interconnector policies • Carbon, Capture and Storage policies
• EU Environmental rules • Climate Change legislation • Renewable Energy Directive •Drinking Water Directive •Wastewater Treatment Directive • Water Framework Directive
